metadata.title: Business User - Analytics & Reporting User Stories

user_stories.title: Automated KPI Dashboard
user_stories.story: As a business analyst, I want automated KPI dashboards that can track key performance indicators and generate insights so that I can monitor business performance in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Track multiple KPIs across business functions

user_stories.title: Financial Reporting Automation
user_stories.story: As a financial controller, I want automated financial reporting that can generate balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow reports so that I can ensure timely and accurate financial reporting.

user_stories.title: Customer Analytics Platform
user_stories.story: As a marketing manager, I want customer analytics that can track customer behavior, segment customers, and measure campaign effectiveness so that I can optimize marketing strategies.
acceptance_criteria: Segment customers by demographics and behavior

user_stories.title: Operational Efficiency Analysis
user_stories.story: As an operations director, I want operational efficiency analysis that can identify bottlenecks, optimize processes, and measure productivity so that I can improve operational performance.

user_stories.title: Compliance Reporting System
user_stories.story: As a compliance officer, I want automated compliance reporting that can monitor regulatory requirements, track compliance status, and generate audit reports so that I can ensure regulatory compliance.
